content: Penny wise and pound foolish as always. The poor can go back to neglecting preventative care, then go to the Emergency Room for urgent care that costs way more money, that the taxpayers with insurance will still have to pay through exorbitant healthcare costs and extremely costly insurance and high deductibles. Americans are so smart with our for profit healthcare system, where only 2/3 of the dollars we spend goes directly to our care. The Right just loves to feed their oligarch masters with the blood of the poor and working class.
